sentences.en: At the office , they slink into hallways, bathrooms, and stairwells.
sentences.cn: 在写字楼里, 他们灰溜溜躲进过道 、 洗手间 、 楼梯井.

sentences.en: Edward was hoping to slink past unnoticed.
sentences.cn: 爱德华希望能悄悄地溜过去。

sentences.en: John was trying to slink into the house by the back door.
sentences.cn: 约翰想从后门溜进房子里。

sentences.en: Should she slink around as if she disgraced herself?
sentences.cn: 难道她该像做了坏事般终日躲着 吗 ?

sentences.en: Slink Remotely connect to your home network.
sentences.cn: 远程连接到您家庭网络.

sentences.en: Yet Britain is not doomed to slink along the bottom of the European league.
sentences.cn: 然而,英国注定不会滑落到欧盟的末端.

words.tran_cn: 早产的动物；鬼鬼祟祟的人

trans.tran_cn: 早产的动物；鬼鬼祟祟的人

trans.tran_en: to move somewhere quietly and secretly, especially because you are afraid or ashamed
